EmailTemplate.subject: Hey, We Heard you Like Virtualization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Hey, We Heard You Like Virtualization
<http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=av> Well what if we told you there was a place where you can access all of the latest news on all things virtualization, a Disney Land for Infrastructure pros if you will. Well you don't have to travel to Florida to visit this magical world. About: Virtualization offers the latest in virtualization from some of the best experts in the industry. Pick your poison from:
- Virtualization <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/virtualization/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=av> - Cloud <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/cloud-about-virtualization/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=av> - SDx <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/sdx/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=av> - Performance <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/performance-about-virtualization/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=av> - DevOps <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/devops/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=av> - Best Practices <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/best-practices/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=av> - And more
May We Suggest You Start With: <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/virtualization/ops-from-mars-devs-from-venus-big-data-is-giving-ops-big-headaches/>Ops Are from Mars, Devs Are from Venus: Big Data is Giving Ops Big Headaches <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/virtualization/ops-from-mars-devs-from-venus-big-data-is-giving-ops-big-headaches?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=av> Big Data is causing my Ops teams Big Headaches. Steven and the Dev team are doing a great job of adapting the development model to utilize Big Data as a data management option for the business, but the challenges are … READ MORE <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/virtualization/ops-from-mars-devs-from-venus-big-data-is-giving-ops-big-headaches?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp_love&utm_content=av>
We hope to see you there! Your IT Control System, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
